Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Plasticin ANC KF (analog of natural peptide ANC)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.17128968]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=12.5 µM), Bacillus megaterium ATCC 9885 (MIC=12.5 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 11775 (MIC=25 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.17128968]22% hemolytic at 50 μM, 48% hemolytic activity at 100 μM against rat red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activiy. The hemolytic activity of the peptides was determined using fresh rat erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: The plasticins membrane adsortpion, lipid disorders, and biological activity.
Literature.Author: Amri CE et al Bruston F.
